text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson Very Good Mr Trump & also Very Good as to Dr Ben Carson & Yes, let's get Our Nation Opened Up & Back to Full Speed Ahead & the Booming Economy we had before Covid-19 hit the Fan & China Should be held to Account to the Very Last Farthing if you get my point??
